entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
